New Records: The Bulls tied their franchise record on Monday night as they knocked down 25 threes.
Key Match Events: The Bulls came out in the second half and erased a 14-point halftime deficit to escape with a narrow win.
Jalen Smith, Julian Phillips, Lonzo Ball, and Ayo Dosunmu combined for 36 points off the bench, contributing significantly to the comeback.
The bench was crucial in the middle of the third quarter, helping the Bulls take care of the basketball and generate good shots.
Post-Match Reflections: Billy Donovan praised the bench players for their performance, highlighting their role in the comeback.
Lonzo Ball commented on the team's new approach to shooting more three-pointers and the importance of staying the course through four quarters.
